site.title: Krynet.ai — 2030 Preview
site.description: Sweden-based, ultra-private, lightweight, and efficient instant messaging, VOIP, and online communication platform. Mixed-source software, built for users who demand unmatched privacy and security.

header.title: Krynet.ai
header.intro: Secure, private, and fast. Krynet.ai is the next-generation platform for instant messaging, voice, group chats, and online communication. Lightweight and efficient, built for people who value privacy above all. Mixed-source innovation at its core — open where it matters, proprietary where necessary.

ceo.name: Johnny
ceo.title: CEO
ceo.bio: Leading Krynet.ai to set new standards in privacy, security, and communication.

highlights: End-to-end encryption for messaging, voice, and group chats
No SMS. WebAuthn and Passkeys built in for seamless login
Mixed-source innovation: open where it matters, proprietary where needed
Supports multiple payment options, including cryptocurrency
Supports local communities, education, environment, and emergency relief voluntarily
Partners with international privacy organizations like the EFF

features.title: Modding, plugin, app, and bot support
End-to-end encrypted messaging, voice & group chats
Passwordless login and MFA with hardware keys
TPM (Trusted Platform Module) support for device-level security
Encrypted search with KrySearch, bundled with Adnauseam & uBlock
TrackMeNot and Quad9 DNS routed through our secure cloud
Watch Together: sync YouTube sessions with friends
Stripe, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Cryptocurrency
Core Krynet.ai app — Proprietary Krynet License
features.description: All security, encryption, and safety features are proprietary to Krynet. Source is closed for core communication and backend functionality.

features.title: Frontend-only tools & safe plugins — GPL 3.0
features.description: Components that do not communicate with Krynet servers or expose sensitive keys are fully open source under GPL 3.0.

features.title: LibreJS compatible
features.description: Krynet.ai is fully compatible with LibreJS, ensuring freedom-respecting JS execution for users.

features.title: Bloodware, Inc (UAE / Afghanistan) – Privacy & development partner
Dead Lantern Games, LLC (Taiwan) – Game development
Velxy Studios, LLC (Dubai) – Media & event partner

sections.title: Voluntary Impact & Community Support

features.title: Support for Local Communities – food banks, shelters, youth programs
Support for Education & Skills – scholarships, STEM programs, coding bootcamps
Support for Environment – tree planting, clean water projects, renewable energy initiatives
Support for Emergency Relief – disaster funds & crisis response
Supports open source software and privacy advocacy globally
Partners with EFF and international organizations to make privacy mainstream
Complies with GDPR, Icelandic, Swedish, and Swiss privacy laws

sections.note: Krynet does this voluntarily, because we believe in it, not because we are obligated.

features.title: Official Repository
features.description: Access raw files (.apk, .ipa, .deb, etc.) directly from our GitHub/GitLab repo for transparency and security.

features.title: Alternative Installers
features.description: Available via F-Droid, AltStore, and web installer at krynet.ai/web. Not distributed on Google Play or Apple App Store for maximum privacy.

features.title: Krynet Premium
features.description: Consumer-focused plan (like Discord Nitro). Offers premium perks but does not include API or developer access.

features.title: Krynet Enterprise
features.description: Includes all Premium perks + Developer access. Integrate Krynet VC/Text chat into your games or applications via Unreal Engine 5+, CryEngine, and more. Supports custom plans with features and pricing tailored to your needs and budget.

features.title: FOSS Support & Recommendations
features.statement: We support open source, we love them, feel free to donate to them. Keep FOSS/Libre-based software alive to fight tracking, data selling, spyware, and corporate or government surveillance. We support Tor, Proton, NordVPN, Signal, Librewolf and more. Gecko-based browsers are recommended on Krynet, not Chromium, because real privacy doesn't come from trusting Google, Microsoft, or anyone who mishandles your information.

repos.name: Vaporware-XE-Lite
repos.description: A curated directory of security and privacy tools with a simple PowerShell menu. Browse vetted resources across malware analysis, encryption, VPNs, secure browsers, and more.

repos.name: LibreAlt
repos.description: Open source alternatives to closed source applications.

footer.text: Krynet.ai © 2030 — Swedish-based, ultra-private, lightweight, mixed-source instant messaging & VOIP platform. Built for privacy-first users. Supported by international partners. Accepts cryptocurrency and other payment options.
